Class TestMojo

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class TestMojo
extends Object
    Unit test the CRXMojo class.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews

    • Field Summary

      org.junit.rules.TemporaryFolder outputDirectory
      Temporary folder in which the generated .crx file is to be created.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setUp()
      Create the test fixtures including the CRX mojo and a mocked the Maven project model and Maven project helper.
      void testMojo()
      Verify that a .crx file can be created without a pemPassword or classifier property.
      void testMojoFailsAfterArchiverException()
      Verify that CRXMojo will throw an MojoExecutionException when () throws an ArchiverException.
      void testMojoFailsAfterIOException()
      Verify that CRXMojo will throw an MojoExecutionException when Archiver.createArchive() throws an IOException.
      void testMojoFailsWithoutManifest()
      Verify that an exception is thrown if there is no manifest file in the source directory.
      void testMojoWithClassifier()
      Verify that a .crx file can be created without a classifier property.
      void testMojoWithPasssword()
      Verify that a .crx file can be created with a pemPassword but without a classifier property.

    • Field Detail

      • outputDirectory

        public org.junit.rules.TemporaryFolder outputDirectory
        Temporary folder in which the generated .crx file is to be created. JUnit will automatically dispose of this temporary folder and its contents after the unit tests are completed.

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
           throws Exception
        Create the test fixtures including the CRX mojo and a mocked the Maven project model and Maven project helper.
        Throws:
        Exception - If there was an error configuring the CRX mojo.

      • testMojo

        public void testMojo()
              throws Exception
        Verify that a .crx file can be created without a pemPassword or classifier property.
        Throws:
        Exception - If there was an unexpected error during the test case execution.

      • testMojoWithPasssword

        public void testMojoWithPasssword()
                           throws Exception
        Verify that a .crx file can be created with a pemPassword but without a classifier property.
        Throws:
        Exception - If there was an unexpected error during the test case execution.

      • testMojoWithClassifier

        public void testMojoWithClassifier()
                            throws Exception
        Verify that a .crx file can be created without a classifier property.
        Throws:
        Exception - If there was an unexpected error during the test case execution.

      • testMojoFailsWithoutManifest

        public void testMojoFailsWithoutManifest()
                                  throws Exception
        Verify that an exception is thrown if there is no manifest file in the source directory.
        Throws:
        Exception - If there was an expected or unexpected error during the test case execution.

      • testMojoFailsAfterIOException

        public void testMojoFailsAfterIOException()
                                   throws Exception
        Verify that CRXMojo will throw an MojoExecutionException when Archiver.createArchive() throws an IOException.
        Throws:
        Exception - If there was an expected or unexpected error during the test case execution.

      • testMojoFailsAfterArchiverException

        public void testMojoFailsAfterArchiverException()
                                         throws Exception
        Verify that CRXMojo will throw an MojoExecutionException when () throws an ArchiverException.
        Throws:
        Exception - If there was an expected or unexpected error during the test case execution.
